name: Moderator (terminal29)
description:
A small game written in 48hrs for the 4 Colour Game Jam.

Note: If you are running the web version, please fullscreen it.

Description

You are a content moderator for the discussion site Roddent inc.

Your job is to slightly edit real posts to generate popularity for your website.

Your companys rival, Fancybook inc., has become very popular lately, and many people trust their news posts more than Roddent.

Use your power to build your platforms popularity and trust while lowering Fancybooks.

Be careful though, editing any post will lower your platform's trust, but maybe it is worth it?

Source: Here
